sources.title: The Great Alaskan Mystery (1944) 13-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 13-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Ralph Morgan, Milburn Stone, Edgar Kennedy
Directors: Ray Taylor & Lewis D. Collins

An American scientist and his team take a perilous journey to Alaska to source rare metallic ore needed for his new transporting device, the Peratron. But when Axis powers discover it can be used as a death ray machine, they face the battle of their lives to keep it out of the hands of Nazi spies!

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Introduction
1:52       CHAPTER 1: Shipwrecked Among Icebergs
19:56     CHAPTER 2: Thundering Doom
38:07     CHAPTER 3: Battle in the Clouds
54:26     CHAPTER 4: Masked Murder
1:11:17  CHAPTER 5: The Bridge of Disaster
1:28:18  CHAPTER 6: Shattering Doom
1:44:06  CHAPTER 7: Crashing Timbers
1:58:58  CHAPTER 8: In a Flaming Plane   
2:15:41  CHAPTER 9: Hurtling Through Space 
2:32:16  CHAPTER 10: Tricked by a Booby Trap 
2:48:38  CHAPTER 11: The Tunnel of Terror 
3:04:35  CHAPTER 12: Electrocuted  
3:20:49  CHAPTER 13: The Boomerang
3:36:39 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: An adventurer goes after Nazi spies who have a new death ray called the Paratron.
metadata.Writer: Maurice Tombragel, George H. Plympton, Jack Foley
metadata.Actors: Milburn Stone, Marjorie Weaver, Edgar Kennedy
